item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.5 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 285893.

item.description: IBM Engineering Workflow Management 7.0.2 and 7.0.3 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. IBM X-Force ID: 286830.

IBM X-Force ID: 285648.

item.title: CVE-2024-28761|2024-08-02T00:56:58.044Z -- ibm -- app%20connect%20enterprise
item.description: IBM App Connect Enterprise 11.0.0.1 through 11.0.0.25 and 12.0.1.0 through 12.0.12.0 is vulnerable to HTML injection. A remote attacker could inject malicious HTML code, which when viewed, would be executed in the victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting site. IBM X-Force ID: 285245.

item.title: CVE-2024-28794|2024-08-02T00:56:58.335Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 286831.

item.title: CVE-2024-27268|2024-08-02T00:27:59.848Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server%20liberty
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server Liberty 18.0.0.2 through 24.0.0.4 is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by sending a specially crafted request. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the server to consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 284574.

item.title: CVE-2024-27275|2024-08-02T00:27:59.967Z -- ibm -- i
item.description: IBM i 7.2, 7.3, 7.4, and 7.5 contains a local privilege escalation vulnerability caused by an insufficient authority requirement. A local user without administrator privilege can configure a physical file trigger to execute with the privileges of a user socially engineered to access the target file. The correction is to require administrator privilege to configure trigger support. IBM X-Force ID: 285203.

item.title: CVE-2024-27264|2024-08-02T00:27:59.731Z -- ibm -- i
item.description: IBM Performance Tools for i 7.2, 7.3, 7.4, and 7.5 could allow a local user to gain elevated privileges due to an unqualified library call. A malicious actor could cause user-controlled code to run with administrator privilege. IBM X-Force ID: 284563.

item.title: CVE-2024-27269|2024-08-02T00:27:59.955Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.5 could allow a privileged user to configure user management that would disclose unintended sensitive information across tenants. IBM X-Force ID: 284575.

item.description: IBM Security Verify Access 10.0.0 through 10.0.7 and IBM Application Gateway 20.01 through 24.03 could allow a remote attacker to obtain highly sensitive private information or cause a denial of service using a specially crafted HTTP request. IBM X-Force ID: 286584.

item.description: IBM UrbanCode Deploy (UCD) 7.0 through 7.0.5.20, 7.1 through 7.1.2.16, 7.2 through 7.2.3.9, 7.3 through 7.3.2.4, and 8.0 through 8.0.0.1 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. IBM X-Force ID: 285654.

item.description: IBM AIX's Unix domain (AIX 7.2, 7.3, VIOS 3.1, and VIOS 4.1) datagram socket implementation could potentially expose applications using Unix domain datagram sockets with SO_PEERID operation and may lead to privilege escalation. IBM X-Force ID: 284903.

item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 is vulnerable to denial of service with a specially crafted query under certain conditions. IBM X-Force ID: 285246.

item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. IBM X-Force ID: 286832.

item.description: IBM QRadar Suite Software 1.10.12.0 through 1.10.18.0 and IBM Cloud Pak for Security 1.10.0.0 through 1.10.11.0 stores user credentials in plain clear text which can be read by an authenticated user. IBM X-Force ID: 285698.

item.description: IBM Datacap Navigator 9.1.5, 9.1.6, 9.1.7, 9.1.8, and 9.1.9 does not set the secure attribute on authorization tokens or session cookies. Attackers may be able to get the cookie values by sending a http:// link to a user or by planting this link in a site the user goes to. The cookie will be sent to the insecure link and the attacker can then obtain the cookie value by snooping the traffic. IBM X-Force ID: 296001.

item.description: IBM OpenBMC FW1050.00 through FW1050.10 BMCWeb HTTPS server component could disclose sensitive URI content to an unauthorized actor that bypasses authentication channels. IBM X-ForceID: 290026.

item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.2.0 through 11.2.4 and 12.0.0 through 12.0.2 is vulnerable to injection attacks in application logging by not sanitizing user provided data. This could lead to further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 282956.

item.title: CVE-2024-38329|2024-06-19T13:43:49.633Z -- ibm -- storage%20protect%20for%20virtual%20environments%3A%20data%20protection%20for%20vmware
item.description: IBM Storage Protect for Virtual Environments: Data Protection for VMware 8.1.0.0 through 8.1.22.0 could allow a remote authenticated attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper validation of user permission. By sending a specially crafted request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to change its settings, trigger backups, restore backups, and also delete all previous backups via log rotation. IBM X-Force ID: 294994.

item.title: CVE-2024-22333|2024-06-18T14:11:47.420Z -- ibm -- maximo%20application%20suite
item.description: IBM Maximo Asset Management 7.6.1.3 and IBM Maximo Application Suite 8.10 and 8.11 allows web pages to be stored locally which can be read by another user on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 279973.

item.title: CVE-2024-27275|2024-06-17T13:27:08.964Z -- ibm -- i
item.description: IBM i 7.2, 7.3, 7.4, and 7.5 contains a local privilege escalation vulnerability caused by an insufficient authority requirement. A local user without administrator privilege can configure a physical file trigger to execute with the privileges of a user socially engineered to access the target file. The correction is to require administrator privilege to configure trigger support. IBM X-Force ID: 285203.

item.title: CVE-2024-31870|2024-06-15T13:47:19.126Z -- ibm -- i
item.description: IBM Db2 for i 7.2, 7.3, 7.4, and 7.5 supplies user defined table function is vulnerable to user enumeration by a local authenticated attacker, without having authority to the related *USRPRF objects. This can be used by a malicious actor to gather information about users that can be targeted in further attacks. IBM X-Force ID: 287174.

item.title: CVE-2024-27275|2024-06-15T13:49:32.863Z -- ibm -- i
item.description: IBM i 7.2, 7.3, 7.4, and 7.5 contains a local privilege escalation vulnerability caused by an insufficient authority requirement. A local user without administrator privilege can configure a physical file trigger to execute with the privileges of a user socially engineered to access the target file. The correction is to require administrator privilege to configure trigger support. IBM X-Force ID: 285203.

item.title: CVE-2023-40696|2024-06-13T16:46:19.638Z -- ibm -- cognos%20controller
item.description: IBM Cognos Controller 10.4.1, 10.4.2, and 11.0.0 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 264939.

item.title: CVE-2021-20450|2024-06-13T16:47:12.989Z -- ibm -- cognos%20controller
item.description: IBM Cognos Controller 10.4.1, 10.4.2, and 11.0.0 does not set the secure attribute on authorization tokens or session cookies. Attackers may be able to get the cookie values by sending a http:// link to a user or by planting this link in a site the user goes to. The cookie will be sent to the insecure link and the attacker can then obtain the cookie value by snooping the traffic. IBM X-Force ID: 196640.

item.title: CVE-2023-40695|2024-06-13T16:45:18.635Z -- ibm -- cognos%20controller
item.description: IBM Cognos Controller 10.4.1, 10.4.2, and 11.0.0 does not invalidate session after logout which could allow an authenticated user to impersonate another user on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 264938.

item.description: IBM Security Verify Access Docker 10.0.0 through 10.0.6 could allow a local user to escalate their privileges due to execution of unnecessary privileges. IBM X-Force ID: 292418.

item.title: CVE-2024-25048|2024-06-04T17:35:01.063Z -- ibm -- mq%20appliance
item.description: IBM MQ Appliance 9.3 CD and LTS are vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking. A remote authenticated attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the server to crash. IBM X-Force ID: 283137.

item.title: CVE-2024-25029|2024-04-06T11:51:45.548Z -- ibm -- personal%20communications
item.description: IBM Personal Communications 14.0.6 through 15.0.1 includes a Windows service that is vulnerable to remote code execution (RCE) and local privilege escalation (LPE). The vulnerability allows any unprivileged user with network access to a target computer to run commands with full privileges in the context of NT AUTHORITY\SYSTEM. This allows for a low privileged attacker to move laterally to affected systems and to escalate their privileges. IBM X-Force ID: 281619.

item.title: CVE-2024-25015|2024-06-05T18:16:18.663Z -- ibm -- mq
item.description: IBM MQ 9.2 LTS, 9.3 LTS, and 9.3 CD Internet Pass-Thru could allow a remote user to cause a denial of service by sending HTTP requests that would consume all available resources. IBM X-Force ID: 281278.

item.title: CVE-2024-25027|2024-03-31T11:40:11.155Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access%20docker
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access 10.0.6 could disclose sensitive snapshot information due to missing encryption. IBM X-Force ID: 281607.

item.title: CVE-2024-25046|2024-04-03T12:17:45.191Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.1 and 11.5 is vulnerable to a denial of service by an authenticated user using a specially crafted query. IBM X-Force ID: 282953.

item.title: CVE-2024-25050|2024-04-28T12:16:32.538Z -- ibm -- i
item.description: IBM i 7.2, 7.3, 7.4, 7.5 and IBM Rational Development Studio for i 7.2, 7.3, 7.4, 7.5 networking and compiler infrastructure could allow a local user to gain elevated privileges due to an unqualified library call. A malicious actor could cause user-controlled code to run with administrator privileges. IBM X-Force ID: 283242.

item.title: CVE-2024-25047|2024-06-04T17:35:50.331Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.2.0 through 11.2.4 and 12.0.0 through 12.0.2 is vulnerable to injection attacks in application logging by not sanitizing user provided data. This could lead to further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 282956.

item.title: CVE-2024-25030|2024-04-03T12:14:19.709Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.1 stores potentially sensitive information in log files that could be read by a local user. IBM X-Force ID: 281677.

item.title: CVE-2024-25026|2024-06-04T17:35:52.765Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server 8.5, 9.0 and IBM WebSphere Application Server Liberty 17.0.0.3 through 24.0.0.4 are vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by sending a specially crafted request. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the server to consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 281516.

item.title: CVE-2024-31908|2024-05-31T13:05:34.385Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics%20local
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics Local 2.0 and 2.1 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 289890.

item.description: IBM App Connect Enterprise 12.0.1.0 through 12.0.12.1 could allow an authenticated user to obtain sensitive user information using an expired access token. IBM X-Force ID: 288175.

item.description: IBM App Connect Enterprise 11.0.0.1 through 11.0.0.25 and 12.0.1.0 through 12.0.12.0 integration nodes could allow an authenticated user to cause a denial of service due to an uncaught exception. IBM X-Force ID: 289647.

item.title: CVE-2024-31895|2024-05-22T19:16:30.321Z -- ibm -- app%20connect%20enterprise
item.description: IBM App Connect Enterprise 12.0.1.0 through 12.0.12.1 could allow an authenticated user to obtain sensitive user information using an expired access token. IBM X-Force ID: 288176.

item.description: IBM Security Verify Access Appliance 10.0.0 through 10.0.7 could allow a malicious actor to conduct a man in the middle attack when deploying Python scripts due to improper certificate validation. IBM X-Force ID: 287306.

item.title: CVE-2024-31889|2024-05-31T12:57:26.223Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics%20local
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics Local 2.0 and 2.1 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 288136.

item.title: CVE-2024-31893|2024-06-04T17:36:39.524Z -- ibm -- app%20connect%20enterprise
item.description: IBM App Connect Enterprise 12.0.1.0 through 12.0.12.1 could allow an authenticated user to obtain sensitive calendar information using an expired access token. IBM X-Force ID: 288174.

item.title: CVE-2024-31873|2024-06-04T17:36:48.030Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access%20appliance
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access Appliance 10.0.0 through 10.0.7 contains hard-coded credentials which it uses for its own inbound authentication that could be obtained by a malicious actor. IBM X-Force ID: 287317.

item.title: CVE-2024-31872|2024-04-10T15:51:04.118Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access%20appliance
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access Appliance 10.0.0 through 10.0.7 could allow a malicious actor to conduct a man in the middle attack when deploying Open Source scripts due to missing certificate validation. IBM X-Force ID: 287316.

item.title: CVE-2024-31887|2024-06-04T17:36:55.759Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20privilege
item.description: IBM Security Verify Privilege 11.6.25 could allow an unauthenticated actor to obtain sensitive information from the SOAP API. IBM X-Force ID: 287651.

item.title: CVE-2024-31879|2024-06-04T17:37:12.194Z -- ibm -- i
item.description: IBM i 7.2, 7.3, and 7.4 could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code leading to a denial of service of network ports on the system, caused by the deserialization of untrusted data. IBM X-Force ID: 287539.

item.title: CVE-2024-31878|2024-06-07T18:25:56.089Z -- ibm -- i
item.description: IBM i 7.2, 7.3, 7.4, and 7.5 Service Tools Server (SST) is vulnerable to SST user enumeration by a remote attacker. This vulnerability can be used by a malicious actor to gather information about SST users that can be targeted in further attacks. IBM X-Force ID: 287538.

item.title: CVE-2024-31907|2024-05-31T13:09:56.762Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics%20local
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics Local 2.0 and 2.1 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 289889.

item.title: CVE-2024-31874|2024-06-04T17:37:24.097Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access%20appliance
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access Appliance 10.0.0 through 10.0.7 uses uninitialized variables when deploying that could allow a local user to cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 287318.

item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 federated server is vulnerable to denial of service with a specially crafted query under certain conditions. IBM X-Force ID: 283813.

item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server Liberty 18.0.0.2 through 24.0.0.4 is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by sending a specially crafted request. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the server to consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 284574.

item.title: CVE-2024-27264|2024-06-04T17:46:47.205Z -- ibm -- i
item.description: IBM Performance Tools for i 7.2, 7.3, 7.4, and 7.5 could allow a local user to gain elevated privileges due to an unqualified library call. A malicious actor could cause user-controlled code to run with administrator privilege. IBM X-Force ID: 284563.

item.title: CVE-2024-27273|2024-05-07T20:17:47.250Z -- ibm -- aix
item.description: IBM AIX's Unix domain (AIX 7.2, 7.3, VIOS 3.1, and VIOS 4.1) datagram socket implementation could potentially expose applications using Unix domain datagram sockets with SO_PEERID operation and may lead to privilege escalation. IBM X-Force ID: 284903.

item.title: CVE-2024-27269|2024-06-04T17:47:00.230Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.5 could allow a privileged user to configure user management that would disclose unintended sensitive information across tenants. IBM X-Force ID: 284575.

item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server Liberty 23.0.0.3 through 24.0.0.3 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in a specially crafted URI. IBM X-Force ID: 284576.

item.title: CVE-2024-27260|2024-06-04T17:47:20.145Z -- ibm -- aix
item.description: IBM AIX could 7.2, 7.3, VIOS 3.1, and VIOS 4.1 allow a non-privileged local user to exploit a vulnerability in the invscout command to execute arbitrary commands. IBM X-Force ID: 283985.

item.title: CVE-2024-27261|2024-04-12T12:13:17.338Z -- ibm -- storage%20defender
item.description: IBM Storage Defender - Resiliency Service 2.0.0 through 2.0.2 could allow a privileged user to install a potentially dangerous tar file, which could give them access to subsequent systems where the package was installed. IBM X-Force ID: 283986.

item.title: CVE-2024-27277|2024-03-21T17:07:55.943Z -- ibm -- storage%20protect%20plus%20server
item.description: The private key for the IBM Storage Protect Plus Server 10.1.0 through 10.1.16 certificate can be disclosed, undermining the security of the certificate. IBM X-Force ID: 285205.

item.title: CVE-2024-22345|2024-06-04T17:52:23.616Z -- ibm -- txseries%20for%20multiplatforms
item.description: IBM TXSeries for Multiplatforms 8.2 transmits or stores authentication credentials, but it uses an insecure method that is susceptible to unauthorized interception and/or retrieval. IBM X-Force ID: 280192.

item.title: CVE-2024-22353|2024-05-15T23:28:10.362Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server%20liberty
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server Liberty 17.0.0.3 through 24.0.0.4 is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by sending a specially crafted request. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the server to consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 280400.

item.title: CVE-2024-22328|2024-06-04T17:52:25.701Z -- ibm -- maximo%20application%20suite
item.description: IBM Maximo Application Suite 8.10 and 8.11 could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially crafted URL request containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) to view arbitrary files on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 279950.

item.title: CVE-2024-22329|2024-06-04T17:52:29.944Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server 8.5, 9.0 and IBM WebSphere Application Server Liberty 17.0.0.3 through 24.0.0.3 are vulnerable to server-side request forgery (SSRF). By sending a specially crafted request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to conduct the SSRF attack. X-Force ID: 279951.

item.title: CVE-2024-22344|2024-06-04T17:52:31.193Z -- ibm -- txseries%20for%20multiplatforms
item.description: IBM TXSeries for Multiplatforms 8.2 is vulnerable to HTML injection. A remote attacker could inject malicious HTML code, which when viewed, would be executed in the victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting site. IBM X-Force ID: 280191.

item.title: CVE-2024-22343|2024-06-04T17:52:33.276Z -- ibm -- txseries%20for%20multiplatforms
item.description: IBM TXSeries for Multiplatforms 8.2 allows web pages to be stored locally which can be read by another user on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 280190.

item.title: CVE-2024-22338|2024-06-04T17:52:35.390Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access%20oidc%20provider
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access OIDC Provider 22.09 through 23.03 could disclose sensitive information to a local user due to hazardous input validation. IBM X-Force ID: 279978.

item.title: CVE-2024-22359|2024-06-04T17:52:35.813Z -- ibm -- urbancode%20deploy
item.description: IBM UrbanCode Deploy (UCD) 7.0 through 7.0.5.20, 7.1 through 7.1.2.16, 7.2 through 7.2.3.9, 7.3 through 7.3.2.4 and IBM DevOps Deploy 8.0 through 8.0.0.1 are vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 280897.

item.title: CVE-2024-22334|2024-06-04T17:52:36.794Z -- ibm -- urbancode%20deploy
item.description: IBM UrbanCode Deploy (UCD) 7.0 through 7.0.5.20, 7.1 through 7.1.2.16, 7.2 through 7.2.3.9, 7.3 through 7.3.2.4 and IBM DevOps Deploy 8.0 through 8.0.0.1 could be vulnerable to incomplete revocation of permissions when deleting a custom security resource type. When deleting a custom security type, associated permissions of objects using that type may not be fully revoked. This could lead to incorrect reporting of permission configuration and unexpected privileges being retained. IBM X-Force ID: 279974.

item.title: CVE-2024-22358|2024-06-04T17:52:37.641Z -- ibm -- urbancode%20deploy
item.description: IBM UrbanCode Deploy (UCD) 7.0 through 7.0.5.20, 7.1 through 7.1.2.16, 7.2 through 7.2.3.9, 7.3 through 7.3.2.4 and IBM DevOps Deploy 8.0 through 8.0.0.1 does not invalidate session after logout which could allow an authenticated user to impersonate another user on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 280896.

item.title: CVE-2024-22339|2024-06-04T17:52:39.586Z -- ibm -- urbancode%20deploy
item.description: IBM UrbanCode Deploy (UCD) 7.0 through 7.0.5.20, 7.1 through 7.1.2.16, 7.2 through 7.2.3.9, 7.3 through 7.3.2.4 and IBM DevOps Deploy 8.0 through 8.0.0.1 is vulnerable to a sensitive information due to insufficient obfuscation of sensitive values from some log files. IBM X-Force ID: 279979.

item.title: CVE-2024-22354|2024-05-22T19:35:18.159Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server 8.5, 9.0 and IBM WebSphere Application Server Liberty 17.0.0.3 through 24.0.0.5 are vulnerable to an XML External Entity Injection (XXE) attack when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose sensitive information, consume memory resources, or to conduct a server-side request forgery attack. IBM X-Force ID: 280401.

item.title: CVE-2024-22357|2024-04-12T02:28:22.476Z -- ibm -- sterling%20b2b%20integrator

item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.5 is vulnerable to a denial of service with a specially crafted query on certain columnar tables. IBM X-Force ID: 280905.

item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.5 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 285893.

item.description: IBM Cognos Controller 10.4.1, 10.4.2, and 11.0.0 does not invalidate session after logout which could allow an authenticated user to impersonate another user on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 264938.

item.description: IBM Cognos Controller 10.4.1, 10.4.2, and 11.0.0 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 264939.

item.description: IBM Engineering Requirements Management DOORS Next 7.0.2 and 7.0.3 is vulnerable to an XML External Entity Injection (XXE) attack when processing XML data. item.description: IBM Engineering Lifecycle Optimization Publishing 7.0.2 and 7.03 could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, caused by the improper validation of file extensions. IBM X-Force ID: 268751.

IBM X-Force ID: 268691.

item.title: CVE-2023-33855|2024-03-26T14:04:37.274Z -- ibm -- common%20cryptographic%20architecture
item.description: Under certain conditions, RSA operations performed by IBM Common Cryptographic Architecture (CCA) 7.0.0 through 7.5.36 may exhibit non-constant-time behavior. This could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information using a timing-based attack. IBM X-Force ID: 257676.

item.description: IBM Cognos Controller 10.4.1, 10.4.2, and 11.0.0 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a stack trace is returned in the browser. IBM X-Force ID: 245403.

item.description: IBM Aspera Faspex 5.0.0 through 5.0.7 could allow a local user to obtain or modify sensitive information due to improper encryption of certain data. IBM X-Force ID: 259672.

item.description: IBM Common Cryptographic Architecture (CCA) 7.0.0 through 7.5.36 could allow a remote user to cause a denial of service due to incorrect data handling for certain types of AES operations. IBM X-Force ID: 270602.

item.description: IBM Security Guardium 12.0 could allow a privileged user to perform unauthorized actions that could lead to a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 271690.

item.description: IBM Cognos Controller 10.4.1, 10.4.2, and 11.0.0 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database. IBM X-Force ID: 262183.

item.description: IBM Cognos Controller 10.4.1, 10.4.2, and 11.0.0 is vulnerable to injection attacks in application logging by not sanitizing user provided data. IBM X-Force ID: 251463.

item.description: IBM Jazz Reporting Service 7.0.3 stores user credentials in plain clear text which can be read by an admin user. IBM X-Force ID: 283363.

item.title: CVE-2024-31870|2024-06-15T19:47:46.043Z -- ibm -- i
item.description: IBM Db2 for i 7.2, 7.3, 7.4, and 7.5 supplies user defined table function is vulnerable to user enumeration by a local authenticated attacker, without having authority to the related *USRPRF objects. This can be used by a malicious actor to gather information about users that can be targeted in further attacks. IBM X-Force ID: 287174.

item.title: CVE-2023-47726|2024-06-18T13:40:39.683Z -- ibm -- qradar%20suite%20software
item.description: IBM QRadar Suite Software 1.10.12.0 through 1.10.21.0 and IBM Cloud Pak for Security 1.10.12.0 through 1.10.21.0 could allow an authenticated user to execute certain arbitrary commands due to improper input validation. IBM X-Force ID: 272087.

item.title: CVE-2024-25029|2024-06-19T22:10:54.453Z -- ibm -- personal%20communications
item.description: IBM Personal Communications 14.0.6 through 15.0.1 includes a Windows service that is vulnerable to remote code execution (RCE) and local privilege escalation (LPE). The vulnerability allows any unprivileged user with network access to a target computer to run commands with full privileges in the context of NT AUTHORITY\SYSTEM. This allows for a low privileged attacker to move laterally to affected systems and to escalate their privileges. IBM X-Force ID: 281619.

item.title: CVE-2024-31890|2024-06-21T09:39:18.569Z -- ibm -- i
item.description: IBM i 7.3, 7.4, and 7.5 product IBM TCP/IP Connectivity Utilities for i contains a local privilege escalation vulnerability. A malicious actor with command line access to the host operating system can elevate privileges to gain root access to the host operating system. IBM X-Force ID: 288171.

item.title: CVE-2024-38319|2024-06-24T13:44:06.541Z -- ibm -- security%20soar
item.description: IBM Security SOAR 51.0.2.0 could allow an authenticated user to execute malicious code loaded from a specially crafted script. IBM X-Force ID: 294830.

item.description: IBM Storage Protect for Virtual Environments: Data Protection for VMware 8.1.0.0 through 8.1.22.0 could allow a remote authenticated attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper validation of user permission. IBM X-Force ID: 294994.

item.title: CVE-2024-25023|2024-07-11T16:32:55.525Z -- ibm -- qradar%20suite%20software
item.description: IBM Cloud Pak for Security 1.10.0.0 through 1.10.11.0 and IBM QRadar Suite Software 1.10.12.0 through 1.10.22.0 stores potentially sensitive information in log files that could be read by a local user. IBM X-Force ID: 281429.

item.title: CVE-2024-40690|2024-07-12T17:47:46.998Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Server 11.7 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows an authenticated user to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 297720.

item.title: CVE-2023-33859|2024-07-14T18:56:02.125Z -- ibm -- security%20qradar%20edr
item.description: IBM Security QRadar EDR 3.12 could disclose sensitive information due to an observable login response discrepancy. IBM X-Force ID: 257697.

item.title: CVE-2024-39731|2024-07-15T01:36:11.783Z -- ibm -- datacap%20navigator
item.description: IBM Datacap Navigator 9.1.5, 9.1.6, 9.1.7, 9.1.8, and 9.1.9 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 295970.

item.title: CVE-2024-39736|2024-07-15T01:32:43.826Z -- ibm -- datacap%20navigator
item.description: IBM Datacap Navigator 9.1.5, 9.1.6, 9.1.7, 9.1.8, and 9.1.9 is vulnerable to HTTP header injection, caused by improper validation of input by the HOST headers. This could allow an attacker to conduct various attacks against the vulnerable system, including cross-site scripting, cache poisoning or session hijacking. IBM X-Force ID: 296003.

item.title: CVE-2024-39728|2024-07-15T01:34:22.464Z -- ibm -- datacap%20navigator
item.description: IBM Datacap Navigator 9.1.5, 9.1.6, 9.1.7, 9.1.8, and 9.1.9 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 295967.

item.title: CVE-2024-39737|2024-07-15T01:27:07.662Z -- ibm -- datacap%20navigator
item.description: IBM Datacap Navigator 9.1.5, 9.1.6, 9.1.7, 9.1.8, and 9.1.9 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned in the browser. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 296004.

item.title: CVE-2024-39731|2024-07-15T13:28:07.939Z -- ibm -- datacap%20navigator
item.description: IBM Datacap Navigator 9.1.5, 9.1.6, 9.1.7, 9.1.8, and 9.1.9 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 295970.

item.title: CVE-2024-39733|2024-07-15T13:29:31.187Z -- ibm -- datacap%20navigator
item.description: IBM Datacap Navigator 9.1.5, 9.1.6, 9.1.7, 9.1.8, and 9.1.9 stores user credentials in plain clear text which can be read by a local user. IBM X-Force ID: 295972.

item.title: CVE-2024-39729|2024-07-15T13:26:18.985Z -- ibm -- datacap%20navigator
item.description: IBM Datacap Navigator 9.1.5, 9.1.6, 9.1.7, 9.1.8, and 9.1.9 could allow an authenticated user to obtain sensitive information from source code that could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 295968.

item.title: CVE-2024-39734|2024-07-15T13:30:42.834Z -- ibm -- datacap%20navigator
item.description: IBM Datacap Navigator 9.1.5, 9.1.6, 9.1.7, 9.1.8, and 9.1.9 does not set the secure attribute on authorization tokens or session cookies. Attackers may be able to get the cookie values by sending a http:// link to a user or by planting this link in a site the user goes to. The cookie will be sent to the insecure link and the attacker can then obtain the cookie value by snooping the traffic. IBM X-Force ID: 296001.

item.title: CVE-2024-39740|2024-07-15T15:53:37.563Z -- ibm -- datacap%20navigator
item.description: IBM Datacap Navigator 9.1.5, 9.1.6, 9.1.7, 9.1.8, and 9.1.9 displays version information in HTTP requests that could allow an attacker to gather information for future attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 296009.

item.title: CVE-2024-39736|2024-07-15T19:04:21.676Z -- ibm -- datacap%20navigator
item.description: IBM Datacap Navigator 9.1.5, 9.1.6, 9.1.7, 9.1.8, and 9.1.9 is vulnerable to HTTP header injection, caused by improper validation of input by the HOST headers. This could allow an attacker to conduct various attacks against the vulnerable system, including cross-site scripting, cache poisoning or session hijacking. IBM X-Force ID: 296003.

item.title: CVE-2024-39739|2024-07-16T13:21:59.764Z -- ibm -- datacap%20navigator
item.description: IBM Datacap Navigator 9.1.5, 9.1.6, 9.1.7, 9.1.8, and 9.1.9 is vulnerable to server-side request forgery (SSRF). This may allow an authenticated attacker to send unauthorized requests from the system, potentially leading to network enumeration or facilitating other attacks. IBM X-Force ID: 296008.

item.description: IBM ClearQuest (CQ) 9.1 through 9.1.0.6 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. IBM X-Force ID: 286833.

item.description: IBM Sterling Partner Engagement Manager 6.2.2 could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned. IBM X-Force ID: 230933.

item.description: IBM ClearQuest (CQ) 9.1 through 9.1.0.6 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. item.description: IBM i 7.2, 7.3, 7.4, 7.5 and IBM Rational Development Studio for i 7.2, 7.3, 7.4, 7.5 networking and compiler infrastructure could allow a local user to gain elevated privileges due to an unqualified library call. A malicious actor could cause user-controlled code to run with administrator privileges. IBM X-Force ID: 283242.

item.title: CVE-2024-27273|2024-07-23T17:02:15.061Z -- ibm -- aix
item.description: IBM AIX's Unix domain (AIX 7.2, 7.3, VIOS 3.1, and VIOS 4.1) datagram socket implementation could potentially expose applications using Unix domain datagram sockets with SO_PEERID operation and may lead to privilege escalation. IBM X-Force ID: 284903.

item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 could disclose sensitive user information to another user with physical access to the machine. IBM X-Force ID: 294727.

item.title: CVE-2024-40689|2024-07-26T13:27:26.097Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify, or delete information in the back-end database. IBM X-Force ID: 297719.

item.description: IBM Security Directory Integrator 7.2.0 and IBM Security Verify Directory Integrator 10.0.0 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to set the HTTPOnly flag. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information from the cookie. IBM X-Force ID: 228587.

item.title: CVE-2023-26289|2024-07-30T17:27:26.142Z -- ibm -- aspera%20orchestrator
item.description: IBM Aspera Orchestrator 4.0.1 is vulnerable to HTTP header injection, caused by improper validation of input by the HOST headers. item.title: CVE-2023-38001|2024-07-31T14:55:44.766Z -- ibm -- aspera%20orchestrator
item.description: IBM Aspera Orchestrator 4.0.1 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 260206.

item.title: CVE-2022-33167|2024-08-01T20:43:33.485Z -- ibm -- security%20directory%20integrator
item.description: IBM Security Directory Integrator 7.2.0 and IBM Security Verify Directory Integrator 10.0.0 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to set the HTTPOnly flag. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information from the cookie. IBM X-Force ID: 228587.

item.title: CVE-2024-22356|2024-08-01T22:43:34.680Z -- ibm -- app%20connect%20enterprise
item.description: IBM App Connect Enterprise 11.0.0.1 through 11.0.0.23, 12.0.1.0 through 12.0.9.0 and IBM Integration Bus for z/OS 10.1 through 10.1.0.2store potentially sensitive information in log or trace files that could be read by a privileged user. IBM X-Force ID: 280893.

item.title: CVE-2024-22334|2024-08-01T22:43:34.546Z -- ibm -- urbancode%20deploy
item.description: IBM UrbanCode Deploy (UCD) 7.0 through 7.0.5.20, 7.1 through 7.1.2.16, 7.2 through 7.2.3.9, 7.3 through 7.3.2.4 and IBM DevOps Deploy 8.0 through 8.0.0.1 could be vulnerable to incomplete revocation of permissions when deleting a custom security resource type. When deleting a custom security type, associated permissions of objects using that type may not be fully revoked. This could lead to incorrect reporting of permission configuration and unexpected privileges being retained. IBM X-Force ID: 279974.

item.title: CVE-2024-22360|2024-08-01T22:43:34.579Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.5 is vulnerable to a denial of service with a specially crafted query on certain columnar tables. IBM X-Force ID: 280905.

item.title: CVE-2024-22345|2024-08-01T22:43:34.611Z -- ibm -- txseries%20for%20multiplatforms
item.description: IBM TXSeries for Multiplatforms 8.2 transmits or stores authentication credentials, but it uses an insecure method that is susceptible to unauthorized interception and/or retrieval. IBM X-Force ID: 280192.

item.title: CVE-2024-22333|2024-08-01T22:43:34.457Z -- ibm -- maximo%20application%20suite
item.description: IBM Maximo Asset Management 7.6.1.3 and IBM Maximo Application Suite 8.10 and 8.11 allows web pages to be stored locally which can be read by another user on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 279973.

item.description: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator 6.0.0.0 through 6.0.3.9, 6.1.0.0 through 6.1.2.3, and 6.2.0.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 280894.

item.title: CVE-2024-22358|2024-08-01T22:43:34.839Z -- ibm -- urbancode%20deploy
item.description: IBM UrbanCode Deploy (UCD) 7.0 through 7.0.5.20, 7.1 through 7.1.2.16, 7.2 through 7.2.3.9, 7.3 through 7.3.2.4 and IBM DevOps Deploy 8.0 through 8.0.0.1 does not invalidate session after logout which could allow an authenticated user to impersonate another user on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 280896.

item.title: CVE-2024-22359|2024-08-01T22:43:34.490Z -- ibm -- urbancode%20deploy
item.description: IBM UrbanCode Deploy (UCD) 7.0 through 7.0.5.20, 7.1 through 7.1.2.16, 7.2 through 7.2.3.9, 7.3 through 7.3.2.4 and IBM DevOps Deploy 8.0 through 8.0.0.1 are vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 280897.

item.title: CVE-2024-22354|2024-08-01T22:43:34.570Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server 8.5, 9.0 and IBM WebSphere Application Server Liberty 17.0.0.3 through 24.0.0.5 are vulnerable to an XML External Entity Injection (XXE) attack when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose sensitive information, consume memory resources, or to conduct a server-side request forgery attack. IBM X-Force ID: 280401.

item.title: CVE-2024-22338|2024-08-01T22:43:34.527Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access%20oidc%20provider
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access OIDC Provider 22.09 through 23.03 could disclose sensitive information to a local user due to hazardous input validation. IBM X-Force ID: 279978.

item.description: IBM System Storage DS8900F 89.22.19.0, 89.30.68.0, 89.32.40.0, 89.33.48.0, 89.40.83.0, and 89.40.93.0 could allow a remote user to create an LDAP connection with a valid username and empty password to establish an anonymous connection. IBM X-Force ID: 279518.

item.title: CVE-2024-22344|2024-08-01T22:43:34.632Z -- ibm -- txseries%20for%20multiplatforms
item.description: IBM TXSeries for Multiplatforms 8.2 is vulnerable to HTML injection. A remote attacker could inject malicious HTML code, which when viewed, would be executed in the victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting site. IBM X-Force ID: 280191.

item.title: CVE-2024-22339|2024-08-01T22:43:34.617Z -- ibm -- urbancode%20deploy
item.description: IBM UrbanCode Deploy (UCD) 7.0 through 7.0.5.20, 7.1 through 7.1.2.16, 7.2 through 7.2.3.9, 7.3 through 7.3.2.4 and IBM DevOps Deploy 8.0 through 8.0.0.1 is vulnerable to a sensitive information due to insufficient obfuscation of sensitive values from some log files. IBM X-Force ID: 279979.

item.title: CVE-2024-22328|2024-08-01T22:43:34.522Z -- ibm -- maximo%20application%20suite
item.description: IBM Maximo Application Suite 8.10 and 8.11 could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially crafted URL request containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) to view arbitrary files on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 279950.

item.title: CVE-2024-22329|2024-08-01T22:43:34.151Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server 8.5, 9.0 and IBM WebSphere Application Server Liberty 17.0.0.3 through 24.0.0.3 are vulnerable to server-side request forgery (SSRF). item.title: CVE-2024-22343|2024-08-01T22:43:34.466Z -- ibm -- txseries%20for%20multiplatforms
item.description: IBM TXSeries for Multiplatforms 8.2 allows web pages to be stored locally which can be read by another user on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 280190.

item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server Liberty 17.0.0.3 through 24.0.0.4 is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by sending a specially crafted request. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the server to consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 280400.

item.title: CVE-2024-31873|2024-08-02T01:59:49.967Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access%20appliance
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access Appliance 10.0.0 through 10.0.7 contains hard-coded credentials which it uses for its own inbound authentication that could be obtained by a malicious actor. IBM X-Force ID: 287317.

item.title: CVE-2024-31916|2024-08-02T01:59:50.705Z -- ibm -- openbmc
item.description: IBM OpenBMC FW1050.00 through FW1050.10 BMCWeb HTTPS server component could disclose sensitive URI content to an unauthorized actor that bypasses authentication channels. IBM X-ForceID: 290026.

item.description: IBM Cloud Pak for Business Automation 18.0.0, 18.0.1, 18.0.2, 19.0.1, 19.0.2, 19.0.3, 20.0.1, 20.0.2, 20.0.3, 21.0.1, 21.0.2, 21.0.3, 22.0.1, 22.0.2, 23.0.1, and 23.0.2 vulnerable to server-side request forgery (SSRF). This may allow an authenticated attacker to send unauthorized requests from the system, potentially leading to network enumeration or facilitating other attacks. IBM X-Force ID: 288178.

item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 289234.

item.description: IBM Planning Analytics Local 2.0 and 2.1 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 288136.

item.title: CVE-2024-31895|2024-08-02T01:59:50.213Z -- ibm -- app%20connect%20enterprise
item.description: IBM App Connect Enterprise 12.0.1.0 through 12.0.12.1 could allow an authenticated user to obtain sensitive user information using an expired access token. IBM X-Force ID: 288176.

item.description: IBM MQ 9.0 LTS, 9.1 LTS, 9.2 LTS, 9.3 LTS and 9.3 CD, in certain configurations, is vulnerable to a denial of service attack caused by an error processing messages when an API Exit using MQBUFMH is used. IBM X-Force ID: 290259.

item.description: IBM i 7.2, 7.3, and 7.4 could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code leading to a denial of service of network ports on the system, caused by the deserialization of untrusted data. IBM X-Force ID: 287539.

item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 is vulnerable to a denial of service as the server may crash when using a specially crafted query on certain columnar tables by an authenticated user. IBM X-Force ID: 287613.

item.title: CVE-2024-31907|2024-08-02T01:59:50.625Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics%20local
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics Local 2.0 and 2.1 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 289889.

item.description: IBM Security Verify Access Appliance 10.0.0 through 10.0.7 uses uninitialized variables when deploying that could allow a local user to cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 287318.

item.description: IBM Security Verify Access Appliance 10.0.0 through 10.0.7 could allow a malicious actor to conduct a man in the middle attack when deploying Python scripts due to improper certificate validation. IBM X-Force ID: 287306.

item.description: IBM App Connect Enterprise 11.0.0.1 through 11.0.0.25 and 12.0.1.0 through 12.0.12.0 integration nodes could allow an authenticated user to cause a denial of service due to an uncaught exception. IBM X-Force ID: 289647.

item.title: CVE-2024-31872|2024-08-02T01:59:49.966Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access%20appliance
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access Appliance 10.0.0 through 10.0.7 could allow a malicious actor to conduct a man in the middle attack when deploying Open Source scripts due to missing certificate validation. IBM X-Force ID: 287316.

item.description: IBM Security Verify Access 10.0.0.0 through 10.0.7.1, under certain configurations, could allow an unauthenticated attacker to cause a denial of service due to asymmetric resource consumption. IBM X-Force ID: 287615.

item.title: CVE-2024-31898|2024-08-02T01:59:50.480Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 could allow an authenticated user to read or modify sensitive information by bypassing authentication using insecure direct object references. IBM X-Force ID: 288182.

item.description: IBM Security Verify Privilege 11.6.25 could allow an unauthenticated actor to obtain sensitive information from the SOAP API. IBM X-Force ID: 287651.

item.title: CVE-2024-31870|2024-08-02T01:59:49.930Z -- ibm -- i
item.description: IBM Db2 for i 7.2, 7.3, 7.4, and 7.5 supplies user defined table function is vulnerable to user enumeration by a local authenticated attacker, without having authority to the related *USRPRF objects. item.description: IBM i 7.2, 7.3, 7.4, and 7.5 Service Tools Server (SST) is vulnerable to SST user enumeration by a remote attacker. This vulnerability can be used by a malicious actor to gather information about SST users that can be targeted in further attacks. IBM X-Force ID: 287538.

item.description: IBM App Connect Enterprise 12.0.1.0 through 12.0.12.1 could allow an authenticated user to obtain sensitive user information using an expired access token. IBM X-Force ID: 288175.

item.description: IBM Planning Analytics Local 2.0 and 2.1 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. item.description: IBM MQ 9.3 LTS and 9.3 CD could allow an authenticated user to escalate their privileges under certain configurations due to incorrect privilege assignment. IBM X-Force ID: 289894.

item.description: IBM App Connect Enterprise 12.0.1.0 through 12.0.12.1 could allow an authenticated user to obtain sensitive calendar information using an expired access token. IBM X-Force ID: 288174.

item.description: IBM i 7.3, 7.4, and 7.5 product IBM TCP/IP Connectivity Utilities for i contains a local privilege escalation vulnerability. The cookie will be sent to the insecure link and the attacker can then obtain the cookie value by snooping the traffic. IBM X-Force ID: 296001.

item.description: IBM Datacap Navigator 9.1.5, 9.1.6, 9.1.7, 9.1.8, and 9.1.9 is vulnerable to server-side request forgery (SSRF). This may allow an authenticated attacker to send unauthorized requests from the system, potentially leading to network enumeration or facilitating other attacks. IBM X-Force ID: 296008.

item.title: CVE-2024-39731|2024-08-02T04:26:15.953Z -- ibm -- datacap%20navigator
item.description: IBM Datacap Navigator 9.1.5, 9.1.6, 9.1.7, 9.1.8, and 9.1.9 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 295970.

item.description: IBM System Management for i 7.2, 7.3, and 7.4 could allow a local user to gain elevated privileges due to an unqualified library program call. A malicious actor could cause user-controlled code to run with administrator privilege. IBM X-Force ID: 295227.

item.title: CVE-2024-39736|2024-08-02T04:26:16.013Z -- ibm -- datacap%20navigator
item.description: IBM Datacap Navigator 9.1.5, 9.1.6, 9.1.7, 9.1.8, and 9.1.9 is vulnerable to HTTP header injection, caused by improper validation of input by the HOST headers. This could allow an attacker to conduct various attacks against the vulnerable system, including cross-site scripting, cache poisoning or session hijacking. IBM X-Force ID: 296003.

item.title: CVE-2024-38319|2024-08-02T04:04:25.264Z -- ibm -- security%20soar
item.description: IBM Security SOAR 51.0.2.0 could allow an authenticated user to execute malicious code loaded from a specially crafted script. IBM X-Force ID: 294830.

item.title: CVE-2024-39740|2024-08-02T04:26:15.996Z -- ibm -- datacap%20navigator
item.description: IBM Datacap Navigator 9.1.5, 9.1.6, 9.1.7, 9.1.8, and 9.1.9 displays version information in HTTP requests that could allow an attacker to gather information for future attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 296009.

item.title: CVE-2024-40690|2024-08-02T04:33:11.909Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Server 11.7 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows an authenticated user to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 297720.

item.title: CVE-2024-39732|2024-08-02T04:26:16.026Z -- ibm -- datacap%20navigator
item.description: IBM Datacap Navigator 9.1.5, 9.1.6, 9.1.7, 9.1.8, and 9.1.9 temporarily stores data from different environments that could be obtained by a malicious user. IBM X-Force ID: 295791.

item.title: CVE-2024-38329|2024-08-02T04:04:25.072Z -- ibm -- storage%20protect%20for%20virtual%20environments%3A%20data%20protection%20for%20vmware
item.description: IBM Storage Protect for Virtual Environments: Data Protection for VMware 8.1.0.0 through 8.1.22.0 could allow a remote authenticated attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper validation of user permission. By sending a specially crafted request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to change its settings, trigger backups, restore backups, and also delete all previous backups via log rotation. IBM X-Force ID: 294994.

item.title: CVE-2024-39741|2024-08-02T04:26:16.016Z -- ibm -- datacap%20navigator
item.description: IBM Datacap Navigator 9.1.5, 9.1.6, 9.1.7, 9.1.8, and 9.1.9 could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. item.title: CVE-2024-39737|2024-08-02T04:26:15.997Z -- ibm -- datacap%20navigator
item.description: IBM Datacap Navigator 9.1.5, 9.1.6, 9.1.7, 9.1.8, and 9.1.9 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned in the browser. item.description: IBM QRadar Suite Software 1.10.12.0 through 1.10.22.0 and IBM Cloud Pak for Security 1.10.0.0 through 1.10.11.0 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned in the request. item.description: IBM Security Verify Access 10.0.0 through 10.0.7.1 could allow a local user to obtain sensitive information from trace logs. IBM X-Force ID: 252183.

item.description: IBM Security Access Manager Docker 10.0.0.0 through 10.0.7.1 could disclose sensitive information to a local user to do improper permission controls. IBM X-Force ID: 261195.

item.description: IBM Common Licensing 9.0 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. IBM X-Force ID: 350348.

item.description: IBM Security Access Manager Docker 10.0.0.0 through 10.0.7.1 could allow a local user to obtain root access due to improper access controls. IBM X-Force ID: 254649.

item.description: IBM Security Access Manager Docker 10.0.0.0 through 10.0.7.1 could allow a local user to obtain root access due to improper access controls. IBM X-Force ID: 254638.

item.description: IBM App Connect Enterprise Certified Container 5.0, 7.1, 7.2, 8.0, 8.1, 8.2, 9.0, 9.1, 9.2, 10.0, 10.1, 11.0, 11.1, 11.2, 11.3, 11.4, 11.5, 11.6, 12.0, and 12.1 does not limit calls to unshare in running Pods. This can allow a user with access to execute commands in a running Pod to elevate their user privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-35133|2024-08-29T16:39:43.913Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access 10.0.0 through 10.0.8 OIDC Provider could allow a remote attacker to conduct phishing attacks, using an open redirect attack. By persuading a victim to visit a specially crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to spoof the URL displayed to redirect a user to a malicious Web site that would appear to be trusted. This could allow the attacker to obtain highly sensitive information or conduct further attacks against the victim.

item.title: CVE-2024-39747|2024-09-01T21:30:21.072Z -- ibm -- sterling%20connect%3Adirect%20web%20services
item.description: IBM Sterling Connect:Direct Web Services 6.0, 6.1, 6.2, and 6.3 uses default credentials for potentially critical functionality.

item.title: CVE-2024-45074|2024-09-04T16:18:12.246Z -- ibm -- webmethods%20integration
item.description: IBM webMethods Integration 10.15 could allow an authenticated user to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially crafted URL request containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) to view arbitrary files on the system.

item.title: CVE-2024-45075|2024-09-04T16:18:41.619Z -- ibm -- webmethods%20integration
item.description: IBM webMethods Integration 10.15 could allow an authenticated user to create scheduler tasks that would allow them to escalate their privileges to administrator due to missing authentication.

item.title: CVE-2024-40681|2024-09-07T14:09:19.767Z -- ibm -- mq%20operator
item.description: IBM MQ Operator 2.0.26 and 3.2.4 could allow an authenticated user in a specifically defined role, to bypass security restrictions and execute actions against the queue manager.

item.title: CVE-2024-40680|2024-09-07T14:02:30.422Z -- ibm -- mq%20operator
item.description: IBM MQ Operator 2.0.26 and 3.2.4 could allow a local user to cause a denial of service due to improper memory allocation causing a segmentation fault.

item.title: CVE-2024-27257|2024-09-10T14:26:43.893Z -- ibm -- openpages
item.description: IBM OpenPages 8.3 and 9.0 potentially exposes information about client-side source code through use of JavaScript source maps to unauthorized users.

item.title: CVE-2024-43180|2024-09-13T01:24:07.230Z -- ibm -- concert
item.description: IBM Concert 1.0 does not set the secure attribute on authorization tokens or session cookies. Attackers may be able to get the cookie values by sending a http:// link to a user or by planting this link in a site the user goes to. The cookie will be sent to the insecure link and the attacker can then obtain the cookie value by snooping the traffic.

item.title: CVE-2024-38315|2024-09-16T15:16:30.485Z -- ibm -- aspera%20shares
item.description: IBM Aspera Shares 1.0 through 1.10.0 PL3 does not invalidate session after a password reset which could allow an authenticated user to impersonate another user on the system.
